Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: When i get stuck on a problem it can take hours or you have to wait for the next day to ask a question via email where as AI is instant and immediately helps you overcome being stuck

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Some teachers are amazing but there are also a lot of teachers who dont answer your questions and just tell you to review slides and they don't care too much if you fail. Chatgpt actually tries to help you until you are completely satisfied and actually cares if you do something wrong.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Some CHatgpt feedback can be a lot more specific rather than just a teacher ticking your page
